sections.heading: or neglected cemeteries; care; item in county budget
sections.text: The county board may include in the budget for the next fiscal year an item for care of abandoned or neglected cemeteries as provided in section 12-805.SourceLaws 1949, c. 35, ยง 2, p. 128;R.S.1943, (1974), ยง 23-113.01;Laws 2008, LB995, ยง 4.
